data.title: Google Search
data.description:
Google Search app for Android: The fastest, easiest way to find what you need on the web and on your device.
* Quickly search the web and your phone or tablet
* Use your voice to search and more
* Get personalized results based on your location Plus: *Google Now* gets you just the right information at just the right time. It tells you today’s weather before you start your day, how much traffic to expect before you leave for work, and more (Google Now is currently available on Android 4.1, Jelly Bean).
